thi-ap31:3.1: 1 Yasavatīpamukhaaṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → yasavatīpamukhabhikkhunīnaṃ apadānaṃ (bj) | aṭṭhārasasahassakhattiyakaññātherīnamapadānaṃ (s2, s3) | yasavatīpamukhāni khattiyakaññā bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhārasa sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap31:5.1: Purimaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ → parikammañca kusalaṃ (s2, s3) | purimaṃ kammaṃ kusalaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap31:7.4: katametaṃ mahāmune → katamhehi mahāmune (s2, s3, pts1)
